note:
Styles upon styles upon styles is what I have. She/Her. I like programming, old video games, and bad puns.

Lead Developer on Rise of the Triad: Ludicrous Edition. Worked on the Doom (2019) and Quake (2021) re-releases. Currently working for Nightdive Studios. Also a developer on the open source Doom source port Odamex. My opinions are my own.

Follow requests with an empty profile or no prior communication will likely be ignored.
